contents.text: Thank you for calling Bebo, the San Francisco-based streaming app designed exclusively for Twitch Partners.
For technical support and app assistance, please press 1.
For streaming quality or connectivity issues, please press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support specialist for streaming quality and connectivity issues.

navigationGoals: Fix my stream’s intermittent buffering and lag issues
I’m experiencing frequent buffering and frame drops during my live streams and need help fixing it.
Diagnose and resolve my RTMP stream packet drops and latency spikes
My stream keeps freezing and disconnecting; I need help improving its quality.
I want to troubleshoot my stream’s buffering and connectivity issues.

contents.text: For help with app navigation and features, please press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a support agent for app navigation and feature assistance.

navigationGoals: Show me how to schedule and manage streams in the Bebo app
I need guidance on navigating the app to customize overlays and manage live chat features.
Walk me through customizing the app’s UI layout and integrating OBS via the API
I’m having trouble finding and using features in the app; please guide me through the navigation.
I need guidance on navigating the app’s interface and using its features.

contents.text: For partnership opportunities or account inquiries, please press 2.
For partnership program details and advertising opportunities, please press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships team.

navigationGoals: Get pricing and eligibility details for joining the Bebo partnership and advertising program
I want information on joining Bebo’s partnership program and exploring sponsorship opportunities.
Get detailed info on the partnership revenue-share tiers and dynamic ad-insertion APIs
I’d like information on how to join the Bebo partnership program and learn about advertising options.
I’m interested in the details of Bebo’s partnership program and advertising options.

contents.text: For account management or billing inquiries, please press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing and account management team.

navigationGoals: Update my billing information and download my latest invoice
I need to update my billing details and review my subscription invoices.
Update my payment method and download my latest billing invoice
I need help understanding my latest bill and updating my payment method.
I have billing questions and need to manage my account subscription.
